original_text: They are to take care of all the furnishings of the tent of meeting, fulfilling the obligations of the Israelites by doing the work of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 곧 회막의 모든 기구를 맡아 지키며 이스라엘 자손의 직무를 위하여 성막에서 시무할지니

sentences.original_text: They are to take care of all the furnishings
fulfilling the obligations of the Israelites
by doing the work of the tabernacle
